mapper.select: SELECT bdate FROM TMPLIST2 WHERE (date_format(from_unixtime(bdate), '%Y%m') = #{bdate}) GROUP BY date_format(from_unixtime(bdate), '%Y%m%d') ORDER BY bdate ASC, uid ASC
SELECT signdate FROM tmplist WHERE (SUBSTRING(signdate,1,4) = #{date1}) AND (SUBSTRING(signdate,5,2) = #{date2}) GROUP BY signdate ORDER BY signdate ASC
SELECT SBBOOK FROM kscbook0 WHERE SBBOOK LIKE CONCAT(#{bcode}, '%') ORDER BY SBBOOK DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM kswyonj0 WHERE WYBOOK = #{bcode} ORDER BY WYBOO9 ASC, WYSUNS ASC, WYGUBN ASC
SELECT * FROM yeo WHERE ty = 1 AND bu <= #{bnum} ORDER BY bu DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM TMPLIST2 AS a, TMPLIST AS b, KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{date1} AND a.bdate < #{date2} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK ORDER BY crnum ASC, a.uid DESC

SELECT a.uid, a.listid, a.bdate, a.bucode, a.m1, a.m2, a.m3, a.crnum, b.bname, b.bcode, b.bmyun, b.bnum, b.bprice, b.btype, c.sbpanh, c.sbjanh, c.sbbigo, c.sbinse, c.sbhj04, c.sbcoti, c.sbsbph1, c.sbsbjh1, c.sbsbpg1, (SELECT wcname FROM KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = m1) AS wcname1, (SELECT wcname FROM KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = m2) AS wcname2, (SELECT wcname FROM KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = m3) AS wcname3 FROM TMPLIST2 AS a, TMPLIST AS b, KSCBOOK0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{date1} AND a.bdate < #{date2} AND a.listid = b.uid AND b.bcode = c.SBBOOK ORDER BY crnum ASC, uid DESC LIMIT #{lm_s}, #{lm_t}
SELECT listid, jm, yb, gubn, jcode, jname, colo FROM TMPLIST3 WHERE listid = #{uid} and (jm != 0 or yb != 0) ORDER BY uid ASC
SELECT wccode, wcname, wcjob FROM KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode > '1001' AND wccode < '6000' ORDER BY wccode asc

SELECT a.uid, a.btype, a.bmyun, a.bcode, a.bname, a.bpanh, a.bnum, a.tbigo, b.sbjanh, b.sbsbjh1, b.sbsbjh2, b.sbsbjh3, b.sbsbjh4, b.sbsbpg1, b.sbsbpg2, b.sbsbpg3, b.sbsbpg4, b.sbbigo, b.sbcoti, b.sbcoti2, b.sbipgo FROM TMPLIST AS a, KSCBOOK0 AS b WHERE a.uid = #{listid} AND a.bcode = b.sbbook LIMIT 1

SELECT a.bdate, a.m2, a.m3, a.m12, a.m13, a.m5, b.*, c.bname, c.btype, c.bcode, c.bnum, d.sbjlsu, d.sbuprc FROM TMPLIST2 AS a,TMPLIST3 AS b, TMPLIST AS c, KSCBOOK0 AS d WHERE a.uid=b.listid AND (b.gubn not like '%본문%') AND a.listid=c.uid AND a.bdate >= #{bdate1} AND a.bdate < #{bdate2} AND c.bcode=d.SBBOOK ORDER BY b.uid ASC
SELECT count(*) as count FROM TMPLIST2 AS a, TMPLIST AS c, KSWCUST0 AS d WHERE a.listid=c.uid AND a.bdate >= #{bdate1} AND a.bdate < #{bdate2} AND d.wccode = a.m1 ORDER BY a.bdate ASC, a.uid ASC

SELECT a.bdate, a.bucode, a.pwan, b.bcode, b.bname, b.bnum, b.btype, c.wcname, d.jname, d.jcode, d.t3bigo, (SELECT wcname FROM KSWCUST0 WHERE wccode = a.m1) AS wcname2, (SELECT pannum5 FROM TMPLIST5 WHERE listid5 = #{uid} AND gubn5 LIKE '%본문%') AS pannum5 FROM TMPLIST2 AS a, TMPLIST AS b, KSWCUST0 AS c , TMPLIST3 AS d WHERE a.uid = #{uid} AND a.listid = b.uid AND a.m3 = c.wccode AND d.listid = #{uid} AND d.bucode = a.bucode AND d.gubn LIKE '%본문%'

SELECT a.*, b.bname, b.bnum, b.btype, c.wcname FROM TMPLIST2 AS a, TMPLIST AS b, KSWCUST0 AS c WHERE a.bdate >= #{bdate1} AND a.bdate < #{bdate2} AND a.bucode=0 AND a.listid = b.uid AND a.m3 = c.wccode ORDER BY iwan ASC, uid ASC
SELECT signdate FROM YEJUNG ORDER BY signdate DESC LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM YEJUNG WHERE signdate = #{signdate} AND bname NOT LIKE '' ORDER BY bcode ASC
SELECT count(*) AS count FROM KSCBOOK0 WHERE ${keyfield} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%')
SELECT sbbook, sbname, uid FROM KSCBOOK0 WHERE ${keyfield} LIKE CONCAT('%', #{key}, '%') ORDER BY uid DESC LIMIT #{lm_s}, #{lm_t}
SELECT A.*, B.sbname FROM INSANG AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN KSCBOOK0 AS b ON a.bcode = b.sbbook WHERE a.pub = 0 ORDER BY a.bcode ASC
SELECT sbbook, sbname FROM KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbgubn LIKE 'B' ORDER BY sbbook ASC
SELECT sbbook, sbname FROM KSCBOOK0 WHERE sbpegi LIKE 'P' ORDER BY sbbook ASC
SELECT a.*, b.sbname FROM YEJUNG2 AS a LEFT OUTER JOIN KSCBOOK0 AS b ON a.yjbook = b.sbbook WHERE a.yjdate >= #{bdate} ORDER BY a.yjdate ASC, a.yjbook ASC
